description: This course is only available to students in the Professional Year of the Bachelor of Education (Secondary) or the Graduate Diploma in Education (Secondary). Students who have two European languages or two Asian languages as their teaching areas enrol in this course for their second European or Asian language.
restricted: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year. For students doing two Asian languages or two European languages for their teaching areas.
